channel.title: Can close i fixed it
channel.description:
if u know at richscape at the top , it stands the name and the clock, and there, i wanna put my Server uptime, like when i restart it begins at 0 sec, so how i do that thing. that it goes with sec + min. or something like that.
[CAN CLOSE I FIXED IT] Thank you people for ur help. and the PM.

item.title: Can close i fixed it
item.dc:creator: @skullman25 skullman25
item.description:
@skullman25 wrote:

He denst want a clock, he wants a timer to see how long the server has been up for.
